defi_sdk_py.chain_client package

Module contents

class defi_sdk_py.chain_client.ChainClient(rpc_url: str, private_key: str, address_const: AddressConst, maxFeePerGas: int, maxPriorityFeePerGas: int)[source]

Bases: Library, Core, Pool, Membership, StakePool, HelperCore, HelperMembershipAndStakePool, HelperPool, HelperFutureTrade

Client for interacting with a blockchain via the Web3.py library.

This client provides methods to connect to a blockchain node, send transactions, and query balances.

Parameters:

  • rpc_url – URL of the blockchain node RPC interface

  • private_key – Private key for signing transactions

  • address_const – Constants for blockchain addresses (more details in address constants module)

  • maxFeePerGas – Maximum fee per gas willing to pay in wei

  • maxPriorityFeePerGas – Priority fee per gas to incentivize miners

approve(token: IERC20Metadata, spender: str, amount: int, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt[source]

Approves a spender to withdraw tokens from the default account.

Parameters:

  • token – The token contract interface (can use with built-in ChainClient.TOKEN.<TOKEN_SYMBOL>)

  • spender – The address of the spender

  • amount – The amount of tokens to approve

  • is_estimate – Whether to estimate the gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

connect_to_web3()[source]
day()[source]
get_balance()[source]

Retrieves the balance of the default account.

Returns:

The balance of the account in wei

hour()[source]
max_uint_256()[source]
parseEther(value: int, decimal: int = 18)[source]
send_transaction(abi_func, value: int = 0, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Sends a transaction to the blockchain.

Parameters:

  • abi_func – The contract function to call (ChainClient built-in)

  • value – The value in wei to send with the transaction

  • is_estimate – Whether to estimate the gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas
